select r.*,m.doctor_id base_doctor_id,m.share_id,d.doctor_teleno,d.doctor_name,d.doctor_avatar,h.hospital_name,rh.hospital_name report_hosp_name from t_report r LEFT JOIN t_medical_record m on r.record_id = m.record_id LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on r.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital rh on r.report_hosp_id = rh.hospital_id WHERE r.report_type in
#{medicalTypes}
